scenes.label: *from_AC_03_12b
texts: Huh? This looks legit, doesn't it? It is, right?
I didn't steal Wind's thunder this time. Instead, I contacted Nonno and asked her to modify her drone.
I'll send someone to help you with that. You just focus on the modding.
Cross! I want you to help Nonno.
As I spoke, I sent him the data from the business card.
Go up the stairs outside to the second floor. She'll tell you to look for a repeater, and it'll be under the trapdoor in the storage room.
As I tore down Waseda Street, I made an anonymous call to the inquiry service at TMPD Cyber Security Division.
This is the Cyber Security Division, please state your business.
The plane is being hacked from Swallow Apartments in Toshima.
How do you know that?! Please elaborate.
There's no time for that. Please, just get to the apartment!
That was probably all I needed to share with the Cyber Security Division. Just enough to get their attention.
Oz, let's team up and take care of Flight 302! I know you're heading to the MTIL. You told me before I Loaded.
So you used that app you mentioned, did ya?
Could you ask them for the captain's BMI password? You can send it to me after I set up a new direct channel to the plane.
You know you're asking for the moon here, right?
I rushed through the details with him, then got to work modifying Garuda's customer data.
